CHOP.description: Channel Operators - process motion, audio, animation, and control signals

COMP.description: Components - contain networks of operators, including 3D objects and 2D panels

DAT.description: Data Operators - handle ASCII text, scripts, XML, and tables

MAT.description: Material Operators - define materials and shaders

POP.description: Particle Operators - create and manipulate particle systems for dynamic simulations

SOP.description: Surface Operators - work with 3D points, polygons and other 3D primitives

TOP.description: Texture Operators - handle all 2D image operations
